name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D】みんなとの絆をチェックして、歌って重大告知を目指す！【#トワ様重大発表】 [t2j89jXBhO8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Special announcement teaser movie showing the year 2020.

subtitles.original: ...いけない今を偽善で
subtitles.english: ...present I cannot paint, with hypocrisy

subtitles.original: 踊る夜に君を連れて
subtitles.english: I'll take you with me into the dancing night

subtitles.original: 邪魔なものは何にもなくて
subtitles.english: There's nothing to get in our way

subtitles.original: 歌う声と軽い足で
subtitles.english: With singing voices and light footsteps

subtitles.original: いつまでも駆けるミッドナイト
subtitles.english: Running through the midnight forever

subtitles.original: 見上げた空 月の光
subtitles.english: The sky I looked up at, the moonlight

subtitles.original: 街の喧騒が光り合って
subtitles.english: The bustle of the city shines together

subtitles.original: 憂鬱な日々を忘れて
subtitles.english: Forgetting the melancholy days

subtitles.original: いたずらな笑みに愛嬌とプライドを 全部捨て去って
subtitles.english: Throwing away all the charm and pride from that mischievous smile

subtitles.original: 見上げた空 星の光
subtitles.english: The sky I looked up at, the starlight

subtitles.original: 街のネオンが混じり合って
subtitles.english: The city's neon lights blending together

subtitles.original: 退屈な日々にさよなら
subtitles.english: Farewell to the boring days

subtitles.original: 僕の手を取って
subtitles.english: Take my hand

subtitles.original: さあ
subtitles.english: Come on

subtitles.original: 常世の闇に囚われたまま
subtitles.english: Trapped in the darkness of the eternal world

subtitles.original: 奏でる悲鳴を
subtitles.english: The screams that play out

subtitles.original: 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear them

subtitles.original: FACT
subtitles.english: FACT

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲・編曲：niki
subtitles.english: Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: niki

subtitles.original: さあ 爪を磨いたら
subtitles.english: Come, once you've sharpened your claws

subtitles.original: まだ子供のような貴方のために
subtitles.english: For you, who are still like a child

subtitles.original: ああ 試されたいなら
subtitles.english: Ah, if you wish to be tested

subtitles.original: その愚かな手に手錠をかけて
subtitles.english: Place handcuffs on those foolish hands

subtitles.original: 常世の闇に囚われたまま
subtitles.english: Trapped in the darkness of the eternal world

subtitles.original: 甘い甘いガムを噛んでた
subtitles.english: I was chewing sweet, sweet gum

subtitles.original: いくつもの後悔を
subtitles.english: Numerous regrets

subtitles.original: さあ 避けて
subtitles.english: Come, avoid them

subtitles.original: さりげない合図に隠れた
subtitles.english: Hidden in a casual sign

subtitles.original: 答えはすぐに分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll let you know the answer soon

subtitles.original: 卑劣な嘘にまみれた
subtitles.english: Smeared with despicable lies

subtitles.original: 拒んだままに受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll accept you even as you refuse

subtitles.original: ほら 悲鳴を
subtitles.english: Look, let me hear

subtitles.original: 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Your screams

subtitles.original: さあ 指を鳴らしたら
subtitles.english: Come, once I snap my fingers

subtitles.original: この孤独のような私のために
subtitles.english: For me, who is like this loneliness

subtitles.original: ああ 喉が渇いたわ
subtitles.english: Ah, my throat is parched

subtitles.original: 紅の下唇に指を忍ばせて
subtitles.english: Stealing a finger to my crimson lower lip

subtitles.original: 狭い檻に閉じ込めたまま
subtitles.english: Locked away in a narrow cage

subtitles.original: 首輪に繋がれたいんでしょ
subtitles.english: You want to be tied to a collar, don't you?

subtitles.original: くだらないルールじゃ奪えない
subtitles.english: You can't take it away with worthless rules

subtitles.original: 自由はすでにこの手の中にある
subtitles.english: Freedom is already in these hands

subtitles.original: 愛情では測れない
subtitles.english: It cannot be measured by love

subtitles.original: 弱ったままに這わせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll let you crawl while you're weak

subtitles.original: ほら 心を
subtitles.english: Look, open

subtitles.original: 開いて
subtitles.english: Your heart

subtitles.original: 分からないふりをして
subtitles.english: Pretending not to understand

subtitles.original: 寝ぼけてるの？ もっと熱い
subtitles.english: Are you half-asleep? Show me

subtitles.original: 暗闇を見せて
subtitles.english: A more passionate darkness

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey

subtitles.original: さりげない合図に隠れた
subtitles.english: Hidden in a casual sign

subtitles.original: 答えはすぐに分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll let you know the answer soon

subtitles.original: 卑劣な嘘にまみれた
subtitles.english: Smeared with despicable lies

subtitles.original: 拒んだままに受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll accept you even as you refuse

subtitles.original: 常世の闇に刻むこの名を
subtitles.english: Carve this name into the eternal darkness

subtitles.original: 分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll make you understand

subtitles.original: ほら 悲鳴を 聞かせてよ
subtitles.english: Look, let me hear your screams

subtitles.original: 夢見ないで
subtitles.english: Don't dream

subtitles.original: ほら聞かせて
subtitles.english: Look, let me hear them

subtitles.original: 人間界に舞い降りた小悪魔
subtitles.english: A little devil descended to the human world
